title: Google Pixel 4a: WhatsApp notification settings only allow ringtones
content:
Hello all,
Just got my Google Pixel 4a a few days back, so I’m on a new phone.
I was trying to change my WhatsApp notification sound (not WhatsApp-ringtone). For some reason, every time I try to do so, I am presented with the selection screen for ringtones not notification sounds. This seems to be a WhatsApp related problem; I didn’t have any issues with other apps.
  I have already been in contact with WhatsApp support about this, but they said, that this is an isolated android problem and that there isn’t anything they could do.
  Yes, I have restarted my phone and yes, I have reinstalled the app.
  Any ideas? Did anyone have similar issues before?
  Thanks in advance.
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 4a
